records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about weather?
records.KccAns:
Dabra Weather Today (1–3 days)
Heavy rain (total 78mm), heaviest during Sat afternoon. Warm (max 32°C on Fri afternoon, min 24°C on Sat night). Wind will be generally light.

Dabra Weather (4–7 days)
Light rain (total 4mm), mostly falling on Mon afternoon. Warm (max 32°C on Wed afternoon, min 24°C on Sun night). Mainly fresh winds.

10 Day Dabra Weather (7–10 days)
Some drizzle, heaviest during Sat afternoon. Warm (max 32°C on Fri afternoon, min 24°C on Sat night). Wind will be generally light.
